mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_ANIME (ANIME_ID, ANIME_DESC, START_DATE, TOTAL_EPISODE, CURRENT_EPISODE, ANIME_SCORE, AGE_RATING) VALUES (#{ANIME_ID}, #{ANIME_DESC}, #{START_DATE}, #{TOTAL_EPISODE}, #{CURRENT_EPISODE}, #{ANIME_SCORE}, #{AGE_RATING})
mapper.select: SELECT ANIME_ID, ANIME_DESC, START_DATE, TOTAL_EPISODE, CURRENT_EPISODE, STUDIO, STUDIO_LINK, ANIME_SCORE, AGE_RATING FROM TBL_ANIME ORDER BY ANIME_ID
